title: Altar (Camdozaal)

properties.name: description
properties.value: The altar in the Ruins of Camdozaal is used to offer fish that has been prepared on the Preparation Table. Doing so grants prayer experience.

content:
Altar (Camdozaal)
Released14 April 2021 (Update)
MembersNo
QuestNo
LocationRuins of Camdozaal
OptionsOffer-fish
ExamineA mysterious altar used in an ancient ritual.
Map
Advanced data
Object ID41546

The altar in the Ruins of Camdozaal is used to offer fish that has been prepared on the Preparation Table. Doing so grants prayer experience.

According to Ramarno the altar was used by the Imcando dwarves in offerings to Saradomin. The altar features a heavily damaged, but still recognisable Zarosian symbol.

Offering fish[edit | edit source]

Players can offer various fish at the altar in exchange for cooked guppies, cavefish, tetras, and catfish, which can all be fished in Camdozaal. Offering fish grants Prayer XP which varies depending on which fish is offered.

Cooked fish Level XP XP
Guppy 7 12 4
Cavefish 20 23 7
Tetra 33 31 10
Catfish 46 43 16

The '''altar''' in the [[Ruins of Camdozaal]] is used to offer fish that has been prepared on the [[Preparation Table]]. Doing so grants [[prayer]] [[experience]].

According to [[Ramarno]] the altar was used by the [[Imcando dwarf|Imcando dwarves]] in offerings to [[Saradomin]]. The altar features a heavily damaged, but still recognisable [[Zaros]]ian symbol.

==Offering fish==

Players can offer various fish at the altar in exchange for cooked [[guppy|guppies]], [[cavefish]], [[tetra]]s, and [[catfish]], which can all be fished in Camdozaal. Offering fish grants [[Prayer]] XP which varies depending on which fish is offered.
